claims: Copper reacts with ferrous sulfate to produce iron.

claims: Copper reacts with ferrous sulfate to produce iron.

Copper reacts with ferrous sulfate to pr: Does copper react with ferrous sulfate to produce iron? Copper reaction with ferrous sulfate

However, since copper is below iron in the reactivity series, it is less reactive than iron and therefore unable to displace the ferrous ion ( Fe2+ ) in ferrous sulphate solution. The reaction between copper and ferrous sulfate will not occur because copper is less reactive than iron.
Does copper react with ferrous sulfate to produce iron? Copper reaction with ferrous sulfate

detail.correction: Copper does not react with ferrous sulfate because it is less reactive than iron and cannot displace the ferrous ion.
